definition[0]: to remove someone or something, or make something disappear
example[0]: She whisked the tray off the table and took it away.
example[1]: He was taken away to begin a prison sentence.
example[2]: This should take some of the pain away.
definition[1]: if you buy food to take away, you buy cooked food from a restaurant and take it outside to eat it somewhere else
example[3]: Fish and chips to take away, please.
definition[2]: to be very beautiful, exciting, or surprising
